_header: He that in youth to sensuality
_description: On living in ease — one stanza rhyme royal

GULHun239.First Lines:
He that in youthe to SensualitieApplythe his mynde to Lust &
                    Idelnes…
GULHun239.Last Lines:
…therfore flee ease and ease will ffolowe theAnd ffolowe ease
                    & ease wyll from the fflee
GULHun239.Note: Added by a hand of the sixteenth century.
